DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Submission Contact Person Fax Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the fax number, a telephone number that is used for identifying a destination fax machine in a telephone network, of the contact person, the person acting as a channel for communication between groups, responsible for the specimen submission, a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes and sent for the judgment of others.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Specimen Submission Contact Person Fax Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the fax number, a telephone number that is used for identifying a destination fax machine in a telephone network, of the contact person, the person acting as a channel for communication between groups, responsible for the specimen submission, a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes and sent for the judgment of others.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.:Submission; a message submitted for the judgment of others.:a channel for communication between groups

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.
A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

Property.preferredDefinition: A telephone number that is used for identifying a destination fax machine in a telephone network.

Concepts.definition: A telephone number that is used for identifying a destination fax machine in a telephone network.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the telephone number for a person or organization.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: contact information for communications over distance, including telephone and fax numbers, e-mail, and web addresses.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Fax number of contact person at participating site

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Fax number of the contact person responsible for sample submission
